n_atoms.description: number of atoms in the systems
n_atoms.label: /input/molecule/n_atoms

n_shells.description: number of shells in this basis set
n_shells.label: /input/aobasis/1/n_shells

center.description: for each shell: coordinates of basis function center
center.label: /input/aobasis/1/center

orbmom.description: for each shell: angular momentum (s=0, p=1, d=2, etc.)
orbmom.label: /input/aobasis/1/orbmom

n_prim.description: for each shell: number of primitive functions
n_prim.label: /input/aobasis/1/n_prim

n_cont.description: for each shell: number of contracted functions
n_cont.label: /input/aobasis/1/n_cont

exponents.description: exponential parameters of the Gaussian primitive functions (1-d array of length sum(n_prim))
exponents.label: /input/aobasis/1/exponents

contractions.description: contraction coefficients for the contracted Gaussian functions (length sum(n_prim *_n_cont), stored as 1-d array)
contractions.label: /input/aobasis/1/contractions

n_basis.description: size of the basis to which the MO coefficients refer (usually identical to n_ao in the aobasis definition)
n_basis.label: /result/mobasis/1/n_basis

n_mo.description: dimension of the mo-basis (number of orbitals)
n_mo.label: /result/mobasis/1/n_mo

n_po.description: for 4-component calculation: number of "positronic" orbitals (n_po < n_mo)
n_po.label: /result/mobasis/1/n_po

nz.description: algebra that is used for the coefficients (1:real, 2: complex, 4:quaternion)
nz.label: /result/mobasis/1/nz

orbitals.description: mo-coefficients that define the mo's in the given basis
orbitals.label: /result/mobasis/1/orbitals

eigenvalues.description: for each molecular orbital: orbital energy
eigenvalues.label: /result/mobasis/1/eigenvalues

occupations.description: for each molecular orbital: orbital occupation (1.0 fully occupied, 0.0 empty)
occupations.label: /result/mobasis/1/occupations

shell_id.description: for each molecular orbital: shell (-1: closed, 0: virtual, 1: open shell
shell_id.label: /result/mobasis/1/shell_id

aobasis_id.description: pointer to the explicit definition of the aobasis in which these MOs are expressed
aobasis_id.label: /result/mobasis/1/aobasis_id
